alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Gibson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 9:27PM CDT until March 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR CROCKETT AND GIBSON COUNTIES... At 927 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alamo, or 14 miles north of Brownsville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Alamo, Bells, Dyer, Bradford, Chestnut Bluff, Eaton, Medina, Maury City, Friendship, Gadsden, Gibson, Tuckers Corner, Grizzard, Quincy, Gibson Wells, Good Luck and Cades. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
